biotools.summary:
Rapidly extracting standardized brain connectivity information in voxel-wise neuroimaging studies.

The mission of the Magnetic Resonance Imaging Lab at the Illinois Institute of Technology is to develop MRI data acquisition, image reconstruction and processing techniques, and to apply these methods for the diagnosis and monitoring of brain disease. MRIIT is part of the Medical Imaging Research Center and the Pritzker Institute of Biomedical Science and Engineering.

IIT Human Brain Atlas v.5.0 Anatomical Templates DTI Template HARDI Template Gray Matter Labels Multi-Layer White Matter Labels Download Now.

Postmortem MRI in aging research Find Out More.
